TopicTitle: "Vector" default mouse hotspot too close to top attachment node

Articles.Content:
When a "Vector" engine is picked from the parts menu, the default mouse hotspot is so close to the top attachment node that it's almost impossible to attach it to another node. With that mouse hotspot, whenever the engine is in a position that would otherwise qualify for stack attachment, radial attachment wins. If you want to attach it to a node, you have to drop it and pick it up at a different point to change the mouse hotspot.

It would be better if the default mouse hotspot were further away from the node, like the other engines.
Holding Alt forces node attachment and disables radial attachment.
